results.name: A114219(signed) * A007318.
formula: Let the signed version of A114219 {1; 0,1; 0,1,1; 0,-1,2,1; 0,1,-2,-3,4;...} = M; and P = Pascal's triangle, A007318. Then A128255 = A114219(signed) * A007318.
